title: CBIC Warns Against Fake GST Notices: Don't Forget to Verify DIN!
content:
# CBIC Warns Against Fake GST Notices: Don't Forget to Verify DIN!

Ek important update hai. Central Board of Indirect Taxes and Customs (CBIC) ne recently taxpayers ko alert kiya hai ki fraudsters fake GST notices circulate kar rahe hain. Yeh warning January 9, 2026 ko saamne aayi hai.

Kuch important points jo aapko dhyaan mein rakhne chahiye:

*   Fraudsters ab official-looking fake GST notices bhej rahe hain, jismein CGST ka logo aur fabricated Document Identification Numbers (DIN) ka istemal kiya ja raha hai taaki woh genuine lagein.
*   CBIC ne sabhi taxpayers ko advise kiya hai ki woh tax authorities se mili *har* communication par Document Identification Number (DIN) ko zaroor verify karein.
*   Aap kisi bhi genuine communication ko, jismein valid DIN ho, official CBIC portal par verify kar sakte hain. Agar verification fail ho jaati hai, toh usey turant report karein.
*   CBIC ne Document Identification Number (DIN) ka mandatory system Circular No. 122/41/2019-GST through introduce kiya tha, taaki indirect tax administration mein transparency aur accountability badh sake.

Yeh alert social media par mili complaints ke baad jaari kiya gaya hai jahaan taxpayers ne suspicious communications ki shikayat ki thi.
